snippet.title: Thirsty Heroes Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Thirsty Heroes is an approachable dungeon crawler and tavern sim with deckbuilding combat for PC, Mobile, and Nintendo Switch, releasing in 2023.  Sign up to be notified on release: https://thirstyheroes.com/#mailing

Music by hyliombi: https://soundcloud.com/hyliombi
Voice acting by Carolyn Malfa: https://www.voices.com/profile/carolynmalfa
